text:
Created attachment 23515
rewrite to enum

rewrite to enum type
Switching this to enhancement and I'm leaning towards a resolution of WONTFIX as I can't see any obvious benefits of this.
creator: markt@apache.org

text:
I think good points are:

- make an easier switch
- an enum is type secure
This change was made to 7. It won't be back-ported to since it is an API change.
